A C D F G I L M O P R S T U

P

PCatchmentSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ChannelSaltMovement.PCatchmentSalinity.
This process calculates the salt load and salinity of the water flowing out of a particular channe as done in PCalcOldAcruCELRUN for the hydrological component.
PCatchmentSalinity(CChannel) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ChannelSaltMovement.PCatchmentSalinity
Constructor that takes a CChannel object as an argument.
PCatchmentSalinity(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ChannelSaltMovement.PCatchmentSalinity
Constructor that requires a CChannel type of CComponent as an argument.
PChannelSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ChannelSaltMovement.PChannelSaltMovement.
This super class has got methods that assist during the transport of salt from one component to another.
PChannelSaltMovement() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ChannelSaltMovement.PChannelSaltMovement
 
PImperviousAreaSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PImperviousAreaSaltMovement.
This process is responsible to distribute salt load from an impervious area into the adjacent river in the case of adjunct impervious areas or onto the surrounding land segment in the case of disjunct impervious areas.
PImperviousAreaSaltMovement(CImperviousArea, CClimate) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PImperviousAreaSaltMovement
Constructor that takes a CImperviousArea object as an argument.
PImperviousAreaSaltMovement(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PImperviousAreaSaltMovement
Constructor that requires a CImperviousArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad.
This process determines the initial salt load stored in irrigated land when the simulation comences.
PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad(CSoil, CGroundwater, CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad
Constructor that takes CSoil, CGroundwater and CLandSegment objects as an argument.
PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseIrrigSaltLoad
Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad.
This process determines the initial salt load stored in a subsurface system of non-irrigated areas when the simulation comences.
PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad(CSoil, CLandSegment) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad
Constructor that takes CSoil and CLandSegment objects as an argument.
PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseLandSegSaltLoad
Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad.
This process determines the initial salt load stored in a reservoir when the simulation comences.
PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad(CDam) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad
Constructor that takes a CDam object as an argument.
PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseReservoirSaltLoad
Constructor that requires a CDam type of CComponent as an argument.
PInitialiseSaltLoad - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseSaltLoad.
A super class for initialising salt load.
PInitialiseSaltLoad() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.InitialiseSaltLoad.PInitialiseSaltLoad
 
PIrrigAreaSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigAreaSaltMovement.
This process is responsible to transport salt carried along with the runoff water from an irrigated area to either a reservoir or an out let of the catchment depending on the location of the reservoir if one exists.
PIrrigAreaSaltMovement(CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigAreaSaltMovement
Constructor that takes a CIrrigatedArea object as an argument.
PIrrigAreaSaltMovement(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigAreaSaltMovement
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PIrrigRunoffSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigRunoffSalinity.
This class is responsible for determining runoff salinity through simple mixing of baseflow and quickflow
PIrrigRunoffSalinity(CIrrigatedArea, CGroundwater) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigRunoffSalinity
Constructor that takes CIrrigatedAra and CGroundwater objects as an argument.
PIrrigRunoffSalinity(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigRunoffSalinity
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PIrrigSaltInput - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PIrrigSaltInput.
calculates the quantity of salt load added to an irrigated area based on the volume of rain falling on the irrigated land and applied irrigation water as well as their associated salinity.
PIrrigSaltInput(CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PIrrigSaltInput
Constructor that takes CIrrigatedArea object as an argument.
PIrrigSaltInput(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PIrrigSaltInput
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PIrrigStormflowSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigStormflowSalinity.
This class is responsible to determine the quick flow salinity from irrigated areas which is assumed to have the same value of TDS concentration as storm flow salinity.
PIrrigStormflowSalinity(CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigStormflowSalinity
Constructor that takes CIrrigatedArea objects as an argument.
PIrrigStormflowSalinity(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigStormflowSalinity
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport.
This process is responsible to transport salt carried along with the percolating water from one horizon to another and finaly to groundwater as well as to conduct subsurface salt balance computations in an irrigated area.
PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport(CSoil, CGroundwater, CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport
Constructor that takes CSoil, CGroundwater and CIrrigatedAra objects as an argument.
PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigSubsurfSaltTransport
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport.
this process is responsible to determine the upward transport of salts from the bottom horizon to the topsoil and finally to quick flow depending on the occurence of saturated upward flow of water.
PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport(CSoil, CGroundwater, CIrrigatedArea) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport
Constructor that takes CSoil, CGroundwater and CIrrigatedArea objects as an argument.
PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PIrrigUpwardSaltTransport
Constructor that requires a CIrrigatedArea type of CComponent as an argument.
PLandSegSaltInput - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PLandSegSaltInput.
calculates the quantity of salt load added to a land segment based on effective rainfall volume as well as its associated salinity.
PLandSegSaltInput(CLandSegment) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PLandSegSaltInput
Constructor that takes CLandSegment object as an argument.
PLandSegSaltInput(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PLandSegSaltInput
Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
PLandSegSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PLandSegSaltMovement.
This process is responsible for distributing runoff salt load from a land segment to the appropriate outflow components, such as a channel and dam reaches, as is done with the hydrological process.
PLandSegSaltMovement(CLandSegment) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PLandSegSaltMovement
Constructor that takes a CLandSegment object as an argument.
PLandSegSaltMovement(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PLandSegSaltMovement
Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
PReservoirComponSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PReservoirComponSalinity.
This class generally determines the reservoir salt budget including reservoir storage and outflow salinity and salt loading

PReservoirSaltBudget - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PReservoirSaltBudget.
A super class for reservoir salt budgeting and salt routing classes.

PReservoirSaltInput - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PReservoirSaltInput.
calculates the quantity of salt load added to a reservoir based on the volume of rain falling on the reservoir surface as well as its associated salinity.
PReservoirSaltInput(CDam) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PReservoirSaltInput

PRunoffSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PRunoffSalinity.
This class is responsible for determining runoff salinity in non-irrigated lands through simple mixing of baseflow and quickflow.
PRunoffSalinity(CLandSegment, CGroundwater) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PRunoffSalinity

PSaltInput - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PSaltInput.
A super class for classes performing salt input to irrigated and non-irrigated lands as well as reservoirs.
PSaltInput() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SaltInput.PSaltInput
 
PSaltStacking - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PSaltStacking.
This class determines current reservoir storage salinity and outflow salinity based on the two cell plug-flow (salt stacking) model as used by Herold (1980)
PSaltStacking() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PSaltStacking
 
PSaltStacking(CDam) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PSaltStacking
 
PSaltStacking(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.ReservoirSaltBudget.PSaltStacking
 
PSaltTransport - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltTransport.
This abstract class assists during transportation of salt from one component to another in subsurface components.
PSaltTransport() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltTransport
The default constructor.
PSaltTransport - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltTransport.
This class assists during transport of salt from one sub-component to another in subsurface TDS balance computations.
PSaltTransport() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltTransport
The default constructor.
PSaltUptake - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltUptake.
This process is responsible to determine the updated salinity level of a soil layer or ground water after salt uptake took place according to first order rate kinetics.
PSaltUptake() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltUptake
 
PSaltUptake(CSoil) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltUptake
constructor that takes CSoil object as an argument.
PSaltUptake(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSaltUptake
Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
PStormflowSalinity - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PStormflowSalinity.
This process is responsible to determine quickflow salinity in non-irrigated lands based on the actual quick flow salinity which is assumed as having same value as rainfall salinity and the delayed stormflow salt load.
PStormflowSalinity(CLandSegment) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PStormflowSalinity
Constructor that takes CLandSegment object as an argument.
PStormflowSalinity(CComponent) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PStormflowSalinity
 
PSubsurfaceSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSubsurfaceSaltMovement.
A super class for classes involved in subsurface TDS balance and salt transport.
PSubsurfaceSaltMovement() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSubsurfaceSaltMovement
 
PSubsurfaceSaltTra - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSubsurfaceSaltTra.
This process is responsible to transport salt carried along with the percolating water from one horizon to another and finaly to groundwater in non irrigated area.
PSubsurfaceSaltTra(CSoil, CGroundwater, CLandSegment) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PSubsurfaceSaltTra
Constructor that takes CSoil, CGroundwater and CLandSegment objects as an argument.

PSurfaceSaltMovement - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PSurfaceSaltMovement.
This class is a super class of all classes performing surface TDS balance computations.
PSurfaceSaltMovement() - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SurfaceSaltMovement.PSurfaceSaltMovement
 
PUpwardSaltTransport - class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PUpwardSaltTransport.
this process is responsible to determine the upward transport of salts from groundwater through the subsoil and topsoil to quickflow depending on the existence of saturated upward flow of water in non-irrigated lands.
PUpwardSaltTransport(CLandSegment, CGroundwater) - Constructor for class ACRUSalinity.Processes.SubsurfaceSaltMovement.PUpwardSaltTransport
Constructor that takes CLandSegment and CGroundwater objects as an argument.

Constructor that requires a CLandSegment type of CComponent as an argument.
